remarks: The covers relation implies the negation of the reverse less-than-or-equal relation.  (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-2011.)
statement:
cvrle.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cvrle.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cvrle.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
cvrnle $p |- ( ( ( K e. Poset /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) /\ X C Y ) -> -. Y .<_ X ) $.
